thread.title: In once-thriving Jefferson County, voters look to Donald Trump for an economic turnaround: Ohio Matters
thread.title_full: In once-thriving Jefferson County, voters look to Donald Trump for an economic turnaround: Ohio Matters

author: Andrew J. Tobias, cleveland.com
title: In once-thriving Jefferson County, voters look to Donald Trump for an economic turnaround: Ohio Matters
text: Steubenville and surrounding Jefferson County have become increasingly Republican as the steel and coal industres have declined in the once heavily Democratic region. Cleveland.com recently visited voters there to discuss what voters expect from President Donald Trump, who won the county by 35 points.
